circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Waterbeach at 2116LT on an operation to Kiel. It turned back due to severe icing conditions and while preparing to land, it crash landed at Wilburton. All six crew members were injured. 
Crew:
Sgt J. H. Russell, 
Sgt R. A. Innes, 
Sgt J. D. May, 
Sgt Dipple, 
Sgt K. E. G. Swann, 
Sgt W. S. Humphreys.
probable_cause: It is believed that the icing effected the instruments and the altimeter was showing a false reading.
